hero.subtitle: WELCOME TO HOTEL Altair
hero.title: OLD STYLE, MODERN COMFORT
hero.dcr: The Art of Luxury and Comfort: Immerse Yourself in the Amazing World of a Luxurious Hotel Where Every Detail is Perfected for Maximum Comfort and Guest Pleasure. Open the Doors to Luxury Where Location, Service, and Amenities Combine for Perfect Hospitality.

sectiontwo.subtitle: RESORT HOTEL
sectiontwo.title: ABOUT US
sectiontwo.dcr: Welcome to our unique hotel located in the heart of ancient Samarkand. Built in a traditional Eastern style, our hotel offers an unparalleled blend of historical charm and modern comfort. Just steps away from the city's main attractions and the famous Siyab Bazaar, our hotel is perfect for those looking to immerse themselves in the majestic atmosphere of Samarkand. Enjoy luxurious interiors inspired by Eastern traditions and first-class service that will make your stay unforgettable.

sectionthree.title: Transfer
sectionthree.dcr: We offer convenient transfers from the airport or train station directly to our hotel and back. Enjoy a comfortable ride, relax, and forget about worries – our professional driver will meet you, ensuring a quick and safe journey.
sectionthree.dcr2: Start your day with a delicious buffet breakfast at our hotel! Enjoy fresh fruits, pastries, and traditional Eastern delicacies. A wide selection of hot and cold dishes will give you the energy to explore the magnificent Samarkand.
sectionthree.dcr3: Our hotel offers the organization of professional excursions around Samarkand and its surroundings. Discover the historical and cultural treasures of the city with our experienced guides who will help you make the most of your visit.

sectionfive.title: Discover All Rooms
sectionfive.subtitle: Feel at Home with Your Family
sectionfive.dcr: Discover cozy accommodations where each room embodies comfort and hospitality, ensuring an ideal stay and unforgettable experience for all guests!

sectionsix.title: What Our Clients Say
sectionsix.dcr: The voice of the client: impressions and feedback about our service, inspiring us to strive for even greater quality and to meet the needs of our guests.
sectionsix.com: I recently stayed at the Altair Hotel and was thrilled. Excellent service, friendly staff, and a convenient location within walking distance of the city's main attractions make it perfect for exploring the city.
sectionsix.com2: From the moment we arrived, we felt a warm welcome and attentive care from the hotel staff. They were not only professional but also genuinely responsive, always ready to help and make our stay as comfortable as possible.
sectionsix.com3: The rooms at Altair were impeccably clean and cozy, adding extra comfort to our stay. The breakfasts at the hotel were also pleasantly surprising with their variety and high-quality dishes.
sectionsix.com4: Altair was a true discovery for us, and I definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to enjoy not only excellent service but also a convenient location in the heart of the city. A big thank you to the entire staff for making our stay so pleasant and memorable!

sectionseven.title: Capture Every Moment with Us
sectionseven.dcr: Capture every precious moment with us: our unique services and welcoming atmosphere will help create memories you'll cherish for years to come.

gallery.title: Virtual Tour
gallery.dcr: Evaluate the comfort and style of our rooms and amenities.
